name: Marc Anthony Bond Repair Purple Hair Shampoo for Blonde & Grey Hair, Blonde Repair - Color-Safe Toning Hair Shampoo Neutralizes Yellow, Brassy Tones & Repairs Weak Broken Bonds
short_description: Wash Away Brass in the Shower: Marc Anthony’s Repair Blonde +Rescuplex Color Care Purple Shampoo is formulated with violet color to tone brassy hues and yellow tones in blonde, platinum, grey and silver hair. 8 fl oz

Repair Technology: Hair fiber is made up of bonds that give it strength. Lightening, bleach, highlighting, and heat can damage those bonds, leaving hair weak, dull, and dry. Rescuplex was formulated to help rescue those bonds.

Pairs Perfectly with Purple Conditioner: Apply evenly to wet hair, lather and rinse well. May be left on for up to 1 minute to further brighten and reduce brass. Follow with Purple Conditioner to maximize tone correction and repair.
Foamy & Nourishing Cleanse: While neutralizing yellow and orange tones, this purple shampoo becomes a rich lather that works across textures without stripping natural moisture.

Endless Innovation: With formulas free from harmful sulfates, parabens, and phthalates, the Repair Blonde collection is perfect for women with bleached, highlighted, and balayage-treated hair in need of toning and restoration.

Perfected to Play: Marc Anthony believes hair care does not need to be boring, nor does it need to be complicated. Hair can be a source of enjoyment and entertainment. All the styles. All the fun. We do what it takes to make hair play possible.
product_description: Wash Away Brass in the Shower: Marc Anthony’s Repair Blonde +Rescuplex Color Care Purple Shampoo is formulated with violet color to tone brassy hues and yellow tones in blonde, platinum, grey and silver hair. 8 fl oz

name: John Frieda Violet Crush Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set for Blonde Hair, Neutralizes Yellow Tones for Bleached, Blonde, and Platinum Hair, 8.3 Oz, Pack of 2
short_description: TONING PURPLE SHAMPOO AND CONDITIONER- Rid your hair of brassy tones and revive your hair with Violet Crush Purple Shampoo and Conditioner
SALON-FRESH COLOR - Color-treated and highlighted blonde hair has never looked so bright, fresh and cool
CRUSHED VIOLET PIGMENTS - An advanced formula with crushed violet pigments, this purple shampoo and conditioner restores and moisturizes all shades of blonde hair
COOLER, BRIGHTER BLONDE - Neutralizes stubborn brassy tones in 1 use for cooler, brighter blonde
CLEANSE AND FRESHEN YOUR BLONDE HAIR - Wash and cleanse your blonde hair, leaving hair feeling revitalized and salon-fresh
product_description: John Frieda Violet Crush Purple Shampoo kisses brassiness goodbye in as little as one wash. Get that bright, salon-fresh blonde look at home with John Frieda for Blondes Violet Crush Purple Conditioner. This intense formula cleanses while instantly neutralizes brassy tones for fresh and brighter hair. Deposits crushed violet pigments into blonde hair to counter-act yellow tones to make color-treated or highlighted blonde hair appear cooler and brighter in as little as one use. An advanced formula with crushed violet pigments, this purple conditioner restores and moisturizes all shades of blonde hair. Satisfaction Guaranteed.

short_description: Toning Sulfate Free Shampoo & Conditioner: Maintain your perfect blonde with EverPure's Sulfate Free Brass Toning Purple Shampoo and Conditioner that hydrates and neutralizes brassy yellow and orange tones in blonde, bleached, highlighted and silver hair
Hydrating Formula: Color-treated hair requires special care. This moisturizing shampoo and conditioner is infused with Hibiscus and Purple Dye to tone brassy hair and leave it deeply moisturized

For Best Results: Use EverPure's Purple Shampoo and Conditioner system 2-3 times a week instead of your normal shampoo and conditioner routine. Lather purple shampoo into wet hair, leave in for up to 2 minutes. Follow with purple conditioner

Vegan Shampoo and Conditioner: EverPure hair products have the purest respect for your hair and have been formulated without sulfates, parabens and harsh salts. Always color caring and powered by science

L'Oreal Paris Innovation: We are a total beauty care company that combines the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in hair color, hair care, hair style, skin care and cosmetics

name: Fanola No Yellow Purple Shampoo - Purple Color Depositing Shampoo for Blondes, Bleached & Grey Hair - Formulated with Violet Pigment to Remove Brassy Tones from Hair (11.83 Fl oz)
short_description: Say Goodbye to Yellow Tones - Fanola No Yellow purple shampoo for women and men is formulated with an Extra Violet Pigment. The rich hue instantly neutralizes brassy and yellow tones, making it the perfect shampoo for grey hair, blondes, and those with bleached hair.

Enhances Shine and Softness - Not only does it neutralize brassiness, but this purple toning shampoo also enhances the hair’s radiance and silkiness. A typical purple shampoo for blondes can be drying, but No Yellow leaves your locks looking healthier, shinier, and more luminous.

How to Use - Apply the toning shampoo and massage into the scalp. Leave on for 1 to 5 minutes before rinsing out. Reapply depending on your desired result. Follow up with one of our moisturizing conditioners or hair masks to lock in hydration and prolong color.

At-Home Toning Solution - Preserve your preferred cool tone in between color services with this purple shampoo for blonde hair. Get salon-quality results at home by pairing with Fanola's No Yellow Mask and No Yellow Hair Color.

Professional Hair Care Made in Italy - Fanola is a professional Italian hair care brand that aims for the highest quality values, processes, and ingredients across all products. Inclusive beauty is at the brand's core with over 10 different product ranges in professional hair care, with this neutralizing shampoo being no exception.
product_description: With time comes change, and hair is usually the first place we notice it. But don't stress any more if the grey streaks are setting in. Fanola has you covered with their line of No Yellow Shampoo. It's made with a violet pigment that turns down the grey or lightened hairs to be less noticeable. There's nothing wrong with going grey, but this No Yellow Shampoo helps you keep your color consistent and vibrant. It's an easy way to help time pass with a little more grace. No Yellow is used for bleached, blonde, streaked, and grey hair.
